Name: Hungry Shadows
About the game: In this grim game you have to confront the hordes of zombies, while on a small plot of land. Zombies are constantly attacking our hero and they want to eat him. Shoot back before the arrival of the rescue helicopter and try to survive this night lighting your way with a flashlight and shooting at anything that moves. - Endless wave survival mode - Unlimited ammo - Longest night in the woods
